title: New Laptop for League and a Few Other Games
body:
I'm in the market for a new laptop, as my current one is on its last leg. I want a laptop for a mix of grad school and gaming. Games I would play are Rust, Dayz Standalone, and Lol primarily with some Skyrim with a few mods. So with that in mind:

http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00IKF2H12/ref=psdc_565108_t1_B00NVV2B98

http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00IMTQ6I6/ref=psdc_565108_t3_B00O4ORQ3C

Both seem like they would do the job. I am just looking to see if people can weigh in on some deciding factors that aren't apparent in the specs. They seem identical aside from the fact that the MSI has a slightly better graphics card. Thoughts?
